title: Troubleshoot Refinery Process Alarm
description: A control room operator receives a high-temperature alarm from a heat exchanger in the crude distillation unit and must quickly diagnose the cause.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the high-priority alarm and bring up the process graphic for the crude unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The alarm is acknowledged, and the relevant process diagram is displayed.

tasks.description: Analyze the trend data for the heat exchanger, looking at temperatures and flow rates on both the hot and cold sides.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analysis shows the flow rate on the cold side has dropped significantly, causing the temperature rise.

tasks.description: Dispatch a field operator to check the control valve on the cold-side inlet for potential issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: A field operator is dispatched to investigate the suspected valve problem.
